description: This API retrieves the status of a shipping document job using the job ID provided

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use. Valid for runtime use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Authentication signature for the API call

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: Generated job ID for status tracking and download the Shipping Document

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error type if an error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if an error happened. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: Generated job ID for status tracking and download the Shipping Document
